entry.title: What Chennai people feel about the rains?

link.title: What Chennai people feel about the rains?

entry.content:
Chennai had good rains I would say, and as usual the government even though it was warned by the met department and the opposition to be prepared for rains, let the city flood. We the Chennai citizens are unhappy about it.

Do you think Tamilnadu government was prepared for #ChennaiRains2017 ?

— Karthikeyan A K (@karthik_ak) November 3, 2017

I just conducted a poll on twitter and it wasn’t astonishing that most people feel that the government wasn’t prepared for it. Whats astonishing for me was 22% felt that government was prepared for it! Thats a huge number infact. If these are the people who are going to vote for AIADMK like fanatics, who knows it would come to power once again.

Another poll was about IT companies in Chennai. IT companies are worst managed things. They are extremely inefficient piece of management, thats because we get cheap labor in Chennai and hence they can be abused a lot. In fact slaves in ancient Rome were able to work for just 6 hours and were able to get away and they had 4 months of holiday! But we are forced to work so much.

This was the poll I conducted:

Did your IT company in #chennai made Saturday working because of #ChennaiRains2017 ?

— Karthikeyan A K (@karthik_ak) November 3, 2017

and not surprisingly looks like 50% of IT companies are inefficient and force their employees to work on Saturday because of the rain.

And here is a food for thought, we the people of Chennai too pay taxes like people in Tokyo:

Reference

  • Should robots be nationalised?
entry.summary: Chennai had good rains I would say, and as usual the government even though it was warned by the met department and the opposition to be prepared for rains, let the city flood. We the Chennai citizens are unhappy about it.

entry.title: Kamal has come up to stage 3?

link.title: Kamal has come up to stage 3?

entry.content:
There are 4 stages in winning a battle against bad people:

  1. First they ignore you.
  2. Then they laugh at you.
  3. Then they fight you.
  4. Then you win.

To enter politics, especially in Tamilnadu and then to win will take a long time, no matter who ever it is, Kamaraj, Annadurai, and other looters, they took lot of time and mentoring and to establish themselves, but for Kamal it seems to be a quick path.

Being a rationalist and possibly an excellent thinker I guess, he is able to make his moves quickly and hit opponents in the right spot. Signs are out that Hindu extremist groups and political wing the BJP are starting to piss their pants.

Recently a person from some terror group in India has called for the execution of Kamal and his fans just because he wrote an article saying that Hindu terror is rising in this nation. I am really surprised, rather than ignoring and laughing at Kamal they have gone to start a fight with him, this is exactly what a truthful person wants, when wrong doers start to fight, it means one is closer to victory.

However history cannot be judged, anything could happen. Gandhi agreed to Pakistan, after its creation he had plans to arose the conscience of people across both sides and start a non violent struggle for unification, but then Hindu extremist shot and killed him. The same thing could happen to Kamal.

Hindu’s, Aryans have no moral defense against Dravidians. Research proves that Indus script closely matches Tamil than any other language. Possibly we Dravidians are the true owners of Afganistan, Pakistan, and Infian main land, and were slowly pushed down to the peninsula till we became finally powerful and undefeatable.

Aryans are awry of history and wanted to disagree with findings and wanted people to believe they own India 100% and its Hinduism is everything that India needs. This is as stupid as Pakistan which says its Islam is all that it needs. Now look at Pakistanis, look how they are? Till yesterday they were slave to United states, now they are slave to China. Of course this that not vindicate India as it has become 100% slave and colony of United States now.

So lets see, whats your opinion, try voting the poll I created. Who do you support Kamal or the extremist?

Who do you support @ikamalhaasan or @BJP4India ? | #india #politics #TamilNadu #Tamil #HinduTerror

— Karthikeyan A K (@karthik_ak) November 5, 2017

Reference

  • Kamal Haasan should be shot dead, says Hindu outfit leader
  • Indus script early form of Dravidian
  • Decoding the Indus Script

entry.title: News reporter Jebersan threatened by BJP

link.title: News reporter Jebersan threatened by BJP

entry.content:
Its alarming how religious violence is increasing in Tamilnadu. Even during partition of India, Tamilnadu experienced no Hindu and Muslim violence. We people simply did not know the difference, but now it looks like we must rethink things. There are people who want to polarize us so that they can come to power.

Today there was a news in Polimer channel in which Thanthi T.V news person asks Tamilisai (chief of BJP in Tamilnadu) a question. Tamilisai complains about the rising corruption in the state and how politicians have turned a blind to people and how because of that 2 kids have died due to electrocution due to watter logging because of rains. For that Mr. Jebersan ‘why is BJP so against a movie Mersal, but its not showing that much intensity against corruption?’, unable to answer Tamilisai becomes sentimental and flees the spot.

Then comes the drama. BJP cadres threaten and corner Jebersan, they question him how can he ask such a question. What? Bloody hell, when will this BJP realize they operate in India which is a democracy? And you should be able to answer it. Is there room for dumb people like Tamilisai in India or do we want a leader who can make us understand things well?

By answering Jebersons question, BJP could have unearthed an weakness in it, and could have proceed to fix it, instead they simply want to hide it from the external world by threatening others.

entry.title: Renaming class in Ruby (a kinda)
entry.content:
Lets say that you have a situation where you need to code about dogs. You know that there are different kind of dogs and you end up with a code structure as shown

So there are two kinds of dogs, one is wild that can be accessed like Animal::Wild::Dog and other one is Domestic which could be accessed in similar way.

So if you want to print out how Domestic and Wild dog sounds like you can write a program as shown:

But if you look I am using something like this Domestic::Dog.new.sound which is long to code and tax my fingers, what if I could do something that would make my typing shorter? Fortunately you can do that in Ruby. See the program below:

In the code above, notice line 5 and line 6, we are kinda reaming the class. Rather using the long form Animal::Domestic::Dog we simply assign it to a constant name DomesticDog as shown DomesticDog = Animal::Domestic::Dog and in line 8 we can use it short like puts DomesticDog.new.sound.

In a large programming environment, we would have reduced lot of typing. Happy coding! :)

Notes

  • Code Samples
  • Download my Ruby Book
entry.summary: Lets say that you have a situation where you need to code about dogs. You know that there are different kind of dogs and you end up with a code structure as shown

entry.title: I am greater Idiot than Rahul Gandhi, says Narendra Modi

link.title: I am greater Idiot than Rahul Gandhi, says Narendra Modi

entry.content:
We all know that the Nehru family consists of a bunch of idiots. The fact how Nehru was merciful with China even thought they were invading us in ‘62, the fact how disillusioned that Indira Gandhi became and brought in emergency rule, the fact how Rajiv Gandhi kept mum when Bofors was going on, the fact how he watched murder of Sikhs after his moms death, the fact how Sonia and Rahul Gandhi watched the 2G scam when UPA was in power are proof to their stupidity and shows inability of them being a leader.

Perhaps being stupid is in the genes of Nehrus, but there is another stupid on the rise, this stupid once said that India was once great in biotechnology, hence it was able to operate a boy, remove his head and put the head of an elephant and called him Pillayaar. This great idiot is Narendra Modi. I think he said this in IISC in front of scientists who must have got heart attack after hearing this.

Indians are so idiot that this guy enjoyed and still enjoys popularity wave in India. Now once again in his speech his idiotness shines. I was shocked to hear recently a speech where Modi was disowning GST. We all are now sure that GST though a good idea was a failure in the way it was implemented. Just like demonetization it was a good idea but waste in implementation. GST means tax will become simpler. Many countries have a uniform tax, say you selling an Audi, you charge 7% tax, say you are selling a pack of cigarettes, the tax is still 7%. Though the GST has avoided multiple taxation (by state and center), the implementers were stupid enough to have various tax categories.

Temples and religious institutions have no tax at all I reckon even though they cheat people saying that a thing called god exists, but alcohol which too messes up with mind is taxed nearly 200%. Why? Because this is what will happen if we are idiots enough to think these idiots are intelligent and vote them into power.

When GST was launched, Modi’s name was on it every where, many in BJP said it was essential and great move. The idea of uniform tax is great, but the implementation? And suddenly when there are state elections, GST rate changes. Damn these fools. Confused, the accounting system in nation is in shambles and none knows how to fix it. Its like Indian re-living the days of Muhammad Bin Tuglak. Now seeing that things have gone worse, Modi is trying to distance himself from the spoils of his governance.

Is this the way a true leader behaves? Shouldn’t a leader have the guts to come out say ‘Yes I have made a mistake, I am sorry, and these are the ways I am planning to fix it’. Isn’t that a mark of a good leader? Why on Earth Modi who wants to project himself as a strong man is behaving like a rat and making fool of himself?

entry.title: Mailsping is evil
entry.content:
I was using mailspring as my mail client for some time, but now I uninstalled it. Mailspring markets itself as a mail client for corporate and like corporates it has evil in its DNA.

As digital freedom progresses, we think that one must not be tracked and ones privacy must be respected, but mailspring thinks the opposite. I was shocked to see when mailspring reported who had opened my mails and when. I called those persons and asked weather they knew that I knew that they had read my mails and they said no. This could mean just one thing, mailspring tracks people even without them knowing. Its evil, pure evil.

People have been made to use mailspring because its convenient, in exchange it compromises their freedom. Thats kind of not acceptable. Instead I would ask people to contribute to mailpile which is hosted here http://mailpile.is . Its not convenient to use, but its surely built with concept of freedom in mind. If enough people contribute, it could become the best Email solution. Or better one can use Thunderbird https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/ with enigmail extension https://www.enigmail.net/index.php/en/ , these will prevent Google and other email providers from tracking you.

entry.title: Quiet proud of my Engineering training

link.title: Quiet proud of my Engineering training

entry.content:
I am really quiet proud of my Engineering training, despite once again due to enormous pressure from my client, people asked me to take shortcuts and I did not budge. I wouldn’t say that I did not get sad, I was upset very much, but I did not budge and do some nonsense to satisfy people.

I am proud because I trained myself as an Engineer. The college I studied which is called Panimalar engineering did a worst job and I came out as totally ignorant person. From that day on I trained myself in programming, assembling different systems to create a product and most importantly technical and engineering ethics.

Tomorrow any thing may happen, I might be accused of my bad attitude and fired from project simply because I was honest with my client, or worst people could work with me with a grudge against me, people may not trust me for a long time thats for sure. The sad part is, some people who don’t trust me and fall to the feet of client would be engineers too, thus upholding indignity that Indian engineers have brought to their profession due to their ill training and inability to keep pace with current progress, and there is a real chance that they would betray me like Peter betraying Jesus.

But I am proud of myself of being unshakable and sticking to the truth, the people who are supporting me in my defiant stand is my mom who is non engineer! How ungrateful I have been to her till now and how much I understand of how much she understands me now.

entry.title: What I hate about medium
entry.content:
Medium is popular blogging platform, but I moved away from it to Jekyll and Jekyll was good. Let me tell you why I don’t like to blog any more on medium.

Medium wants to track you

Medium loves to track you. It wants to know what your interests are? What you like to read? Who you follow? Are people working in Medium your friends to know these details about you?

Though medium does not force you to login, look at this ugly tool bar at the bottom

Medium reduces your reading area, it forces you to sign in to read so that it knows about you.

You don’t know what they do with your data

Do you really know what Medium does with your data and the behavioral data they collect from you? Do they sell it to others? Share it to NSA? Who knows? This is the major problem we face today using software as service platforms.

Anonymous commenting not possible

Even to comment on ones blog, one needs to login to medium and have a medium account. Thats ridiculous. Commenting means you have more interest on that particular topic, so you can be sold more ads about it. Thats why they want you to login so that they can track about you.

Blog migration is hard

Migrating your blog content away from Medium is hard. Unlike Wordpress you do not have a good migration tool or a tool where you can download all your data.

What happens if you delete your blog?

In medium, none know what happens if you delete your blog or account. Does it really get deleted? Your details are kept by them even if you have deleted your account? Who knows what they are doing without your knowledge?

Conclusion

All these questions have made me to log off medium, I wish you too do the same. Its far far better to have your own server, possibly a wordpress one and blog with it.

entry.title: Why people use JIRA
entry.content:
Jira is a popular project management tool used by thousands of projects, but do developers really like it?

how much jira do we have to use before we're agile?

— 0operator (@sadoperator) October 5, 2017

If they don’t, then why people use Jira? Well, Information Technology industry is more about deception than real science and software, and Jira is much needed by management folks for deceiving their client, so they use it.

Jira has done lot of brand building

First, Jira has done lot of brand building, it has made people to believe using it will make things cool ad people have some how believe it. Some how none who bat for Jira can publish a scientific study that Jira has improved their efficiency.

Jira is a jargon

Most of clients are ignorant, you tell them that you are using big data with blockchain and everything is managed by Jira where he can know the status of the project at his finger tip, then he would succumb to the jargon and think you are great and you really know stuff.

Jira introduces inefficiency

Clients and management like to see their team sweat out even if things are really easy. Trust me, I am a programmer for 15 years and I have seen how people make simple things complex and make you go mad.

Jira introduces inefficiency into project, it makes the project difficult to manage and you need managers to do it. This creates fake jobs, plus having a manager means the company can bill the client more.

Atlassian needs to survive

Atlassian is one big corporate mess of fat ass bosses who needs to feed like pigs, go on to Italian holidays, stay in star hotels and claim that they have changed the world for good by introducing Jira, if you don’t use them they have to make a living by cheating the world in another way. So please trust and use Jira without questioning.

Stay happy living like a goat as ignorance is bliss.
entry.summary: Jira is a popular project management tool used by thousands of projects, but do developers really like it?
